skill.description: Review documentation changes for compliance with the Metabase writing style guide. Use when reviewing pull requests, files, or diffs containing documentation markdown files.

skill.author: metabase

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill containing only documentation review instructions. No executable code, scripts, network calls, or file system access patterns are present beyond standard LLM tool usage.

content.user_title: Review documentation for Metabase style compliance
content.value_statement: Documentation reviews can miss clarity and tone issues. This skill guides a structured review aligned with the Metabase style guide.
actual_capabilities: Review documentation changes against the Metabase style guide
Choose PR review or local review mode based on available tools
Produce sequentially numbered issues with a required format
Check tone, structure, links, formatting, and examples for issues
Provide suggested fixes for flagged documentation issues
limitations: Only covers documentation review, not code correctness
Requires access to the style guide reference for full context
Does not auto edit files or apply fixes
PR review workflow depends on GitHub MCP tools

use_cases.title: Polish doc updates
use_cases.description: Review a markdown diff for tone and clarity before publishing.

use_cases.title: PR doc check
use_cases.description: Validate documentation changes in a pull request with numbered issues.

use_cases.title: Style compliance audit
use_cases.description: Ensure a documentation section follows the Metabase style guide.

prompt_templates.title: Review a doc file
prompt_templates.prompt: Review this markdown file for Metabase style guide issues and list numbered problems with suggested fixes.

prompt_templates.title: Review a diff
prompt_templates.prompt: Check this doc diff for tone, clarity, links, and formatting issues. Number each issue and suggest fixes.

prompt_templates.title: PR review mode
prompt_templates.prompt: Use PR review mode and comment on all documentation issues with sequential numbering.

prompt_templates.title: Deep style audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Perform a thorough style guide audit on this documentation section and provide only material issues.

output_examples.input: Review this doc diff for style issues.
output: Issue 1: Vague heading that does not state the action
Issue 2: Uses formal tone that should be more conversational
Issue 3: Link text says here instead of descriptive wording

best_practices: Provide the diff or file content and mention the review mode you want
Share any required context for terminology or product names
Focus on material issues that affect clarity or tone
anti_patterns: Asking for code logic review instead of documentation review
Providing no content or diff to review
Requesting auto fixes without reviewing the output

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill provides text based review guidance that works across these platforms.

faq.question: What are the limits of the review?
faq.answer: It reviews documentation style and clarity, not code correctness or technical accuracy.

faq.question: Can it integrate with GitHub pull requests?
faq.answer: Yes, when GitHub MCP review tools are available, it can use PR review mode.

faq.question: Does it access or store my data?
faq.answer: No, it only reviews the provided content and does not access files or networks.

faq.question: What should I do if feedback seems too strict?
faq.answer: Clarify your desired tone and provide context so the review can focus on material issues.

faq.question: How does it compare to general grammar tools?
faq.answer: It focuses on the Metabase style guide and documentation specific patterns.
